trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed change to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> within a running workflow instance.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class is the base class for the canonical change actions which are added and removed and may be performed on a collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"></xref> class, initializing the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>.
compositeActivity is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Gets and sets the OwnerActivityDottedPath of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> associated with this instance.
This manipulates the OwnerActivityDottedPath member of the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
Therefore, trying to set this without first initializing the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> will cause an exception to be thrown.
The OwnerActivityDottedPath of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> associated with this instance.
Validates the changes pending on the target activity.
If `contextActivity` cannot be safely cast to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> a null reference is returned.
The activity to have its changes validated.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> that contains any <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"></xref> resulting from running each <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> defined for the target activity.
contextActivity is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
